segments.text: I see the cookie jar is almost within the boy’s reach, but he’s really pushing his luck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate—what a little strategist!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how determined he looks, even if it’s a bit reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, hoping for a handout—classic sibling dynamic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is clueless, just drying that same plate over and over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious she is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading onto the floor, and she doesn’t even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like a cartoon waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
